import React from "react" import Link from "next/link" import { css } from "aphrodite/no-important" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import { faArrowLeft } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons" import { ModalSetting } from "../../" import baseStyle from '../../../styles' import styles from './styles' import { Location } from '../../../types/locations' type MyInformationProps = { location: Location handleClick: () => void closeWindow: boolean } export const Information: React.FC = ({ location, handleClick, closeWindow }) => { const { cover, linkToPost, small_text, title } = location const viewWindow = closeWindow ? css(styles.wrapper, styles.closedWindow) : css(styles.wrapper) return

{ title }

{ small_text }

{ linkToPost.length !== 0 ?

Більше про { title } можете подивитись тут:

{ title }
:
123
}
}
